ResumeParserData.Experience: Product Manager	,NatWest Bank  Manchester, UK	,2015 - Present  Directed the launch of new banking products, resulting in a 25% increase in customer retention.  Coordinated with marketing and sales teams to ensure successful product rollout and adoption.  Product Manager	,Santander UK  Manchester, UK	,2009 - 2015  Oversaw the development and management of a diverse product portfolio, boosting overall revenue by 18%.  Implemented data-driven strategies to enhance product performance and customer satisfaction.  Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society  Manchester, UK	,2003 - 2009  Led cross-functional teams to deliver innovative financial solutions, achieving a 12% market growth.  Conducted thorough market research to stay ahead of industry trends and customer needs.  Product Manager	,Halifax Bank  Manchester, UK	,1998 - 2003  Managed end to end product lifecycle, from ideation to market launch, ensuring customer-centric design.  Fostered strong relationships with stakeholders to align product strategies with business goals.  Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks  Manchester, UK	,1994 - 1998  Gained extensive experience in product management through various positions in top UK banks.  Developed a deep understanding of banking operations and product development.

ResumeParserData.Summary: An accomplished Product Manager with a robust 30-year career in the banking sector, having collaborated with leading UK banks. Recognized for strategic vision, exceptional leadership, and a customer-centric approach to product management. Demonstrates expertise in developing innovative financial products that drive business success. Seeking to apply a wealth of experience to a dynamic and progressive organization.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Jane has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Marketing and Sales Managers. The candidate has been working as a Product Manager at NatWest Bank for the last 9.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Jane holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at NatWest Bank. from 01/01/2015 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 9.7 years in this company.

Jane holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Santander UK. from 01/01/2009 to 31/12/2015. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

Jane holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Nationwide Building Society. from 01/01/2003 to 31/12/2009. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

Jane holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Halifax Bank. from 01/01/1998 to 31/12/2003. The candidate has a total experience of 6.0 years in this company.

ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
Jane Williams
Address : 45 Elm Street, Manchester, England
Email : jane.williams@example.com
Phone : 07890 123456

Personal Statement
An accomplished Product Manager with a robust 30-year career in the banking sector, having collaborated with leading UK banks. Recognized for strategic vision, exceptional leadership, and a customer-centric approach to product management. Demonstrates expertise in developing innovative financial products that drive business success. Seeking to apply a wealth of experience to a dynamic and progressive organization.

Education History
University of Leeds (Russell Group) 
BSc Mathematics
Graduated : 1994

Work History
Product Manager	,NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK	,2015 - Present
Directed the launch of new banking products, resulting in a 25% increase in customer retention.
Coordinated with marketing and sales teams to ensure successful product rollout and adoption.
Product Manager	,Santander UK
Manchester, UK	,2009 - 2015
Oversaw the development and management of a diverse product portfolio, boosting overall revenue by 18%.
Implemented data-driven strategies to enhance product performance and customer satisfaction.
Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK	,2003 - 2009
Led cross-functional teams to deliver innovative financial solutions, achieving a 12% market growth.
Conducted thorough market research to stay ahead of industry trends and customer needs.
Product Manager	,Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK	,1998 - 2003
Managed end-to-end product lifecycle, from ideation to market launch, ensuring customer-centric design.
Fostered strong relationships with stakeholders to align product strategies with business goals.
Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK	,1994 - 1998
Gained extensive experience in product management through various positions in top UK banks.
Developed a deep understanding of banking operations and product development.

Skills
Product Development and Innovation
Market Research and Competitive Analysis
Project Management and Leadership
Stakeholder Engagement
Customer Experience Enhancement

Qualifications
Certified Product Manager (CPM) 
PRINCE2 Practitioner
Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) 
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) 

Personal Hobbies
Running : Regular participant in marathons and charity runs.
Gardening : Passionate about cultivating a variety of plants and maintaining a home garden.
Photography : Enjoy capturing landscapes and urban scenes.
Baking : Love experimenting with new baking recipes and techniques.
Mentoring : Active mentor for young professionals in the banking industry.

AMS - Confidential

AMS - Confidential

ResumeParserData.HtmlResume:
Jane Williams

Address: 45 Elm Street, Manchester, England
Email: jane.williams@example.com
Phone: 07890 123456

Personal Statement

An accomplished Product Manager with a robust 30-year career in the banking sector, having collaborated with leading UK banks. Recognized for strategic vision, exceptional leadership, and a customer-centric approach to product management. Demonstrates expertise in developing innovative financial products that drive business success. Seeking to apply a wealth of experience to a dynamic and progressive organization.

Education History

University of Leeds (Russell Group)

  • BSc Mathematics
  • Graduated: 1994

Work History

Product Manager | NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK | 2015 - Present

  • Directed the launch of new banking products, resulting in a 25% increase in customer retention.
  • Coordinated with marketing and sales teams to ensure successful product rollout and adoption.

Product Manager | Santander UK
Manchester, UK | 2009 - 2015

  • Oversaw the development and management of a diverse product portfolio, boosting overall revenue by 18%.
  • Implemented data-driven strategies to enhance product performance and customer satisfaction.

Product Manager | Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK | 2003 - 2009

  • Led cross-functional teams to deliver innovative financial solutions, achieving a 12% market growth.
  • Conducted thorough market research to stay ahead of industry trends and customer needs.

Product Manager | Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK | 1998 - 2003

  • Managed end-to-end product lifecycle, from ideation to market launch, ensuring customer-centric design.
  • Fostered strong relationships with stakeholders to align product strategies with business goals.

Various Roles in Product Management | Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK | 1994 - 1998

  • Gained extensive experience in product management through various positions in top UK banks.
  • Developed a deep understanding of banking operations and product development.

Skills

  • Product Development and Innovation
  • Market Research and Competitive Analysis
  • Project Management and Leadership
  • Stakeholder Engagement
  • Customer Experience Enhancement

Qualifications

  • Certified Product Manager (CPM)
  • PRINCE2 Practitioner
  • Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)
  • Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
  • Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO)

Personal Hobbies

  • Running: Regular participant in marathons and charity runs.
  • Gardening: Passionate about cultivating a variety of plants and maintaining a home garden.
  • Photography: Enjoy capturing landscapes and urban scenes.
  • Baking: Love experimenting with new baking recipes and techniques.
  • Mentoring: Active mentor for young professionals in the banking industry.
